Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 76th overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/21/2015...
Injured on 9/22/2015 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/9/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 6/12/2016, off Alberto Arroyo (KC)...
Injured on 6/22/2016 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 6-7 weeks...
